metadata.name: Vellum 001
metadata.description:
Moments fade away, memories last forever.

A dance is ephemeral and happens in the moment, a fraction of time that instantly vanishes forever in the past.
Live dance performance creates fleeting emotions that only the video medium can encapsulate in a persistent memory. Without however fully capturing the impermanence immanent to the beauty of dance.

Can a sculpture - a digital & tangible expression of space & time - resulting from a live dance movements captures these emotions ?
